data.description:
Do you know where ***Faroe Islands*** are? We took an expedition there and filmed all the beauty it can offer. 
With this app you can fast travel there, just by putting your headset on. 

You can enjoy full ***360 3D videos of the nicest locations*** on the island and listen to ***spatial sounds*** of the nature accompanied with ***narrative voice over description of each location in English, German and Danish***. Other languages like Spanish and French will be coming soon in an update!

You can navigate by clicking on Teleport Points, by clicking places on the map or just go through all the places by pushing the joystick forward. If you have difficulties with using a controller (elderly people) you can just press play and the app will take you through all the places, staying everywhere for 20 seconds.

![{"height":1232,"type":"image","width":1640}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569450_2871989699633054_625037328392556892_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oAEPw0J0PvIQ7kNvgFPuZUV&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYACXs9PILCVKChEg3POXLXIBtMMU1PcB8UpHvvepnHf0A&oe=67051F4A)

Feel the heights of the cliffs, observe the Puffins, stand under the waterfalls.

The final app now have over ***120 viewpoints from around 40 scenes***, where you can travel.
In each scene (touristic hot spot) you have usually around ***3-10 viewpoints***, where you can immerse yourself into the beauty of Faroe Islands. 

![{"height":1125,"type":"image","width":1500}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003238_1711048789713427_7084155304832927721_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vFkHb7Ms2WAQ7kNvgHvUAQs&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDco1OvjDCIZFrl_qWzxe2iBK00e27pm4cIkHk5YE53lg&oe=670528B7)
To list just some of them:

* Bøsdalafossur waterfall
* Gasadalur
* Saksun
* Skarðsáfossur
* Trælanípa 
* Tórshavn
* Týggjará Waterfall


![{"height":1125,"type":"image","width":1500}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982620_1260933045264526_6258066118453042545_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WqGf67uRwqQQ7kNvgF_d3Qm&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDQiXjBFuX-x2mOqZ6sPEnAFmWReSBnxxZc5yN_chvL7Q&oe=67051FD8)
But be careful, sometimes the locations are on an edge of a cliff and if you look at them in the immersive 360 3D view, you might get a bit dizzy.

Embark on an exciting journey to Faroe Islands now!
![{"height":1198,"type":"image","width":2207}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982679_869136748612484_8855755168984793251_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=en73WayrjrQQ7kNvgH9-CAi&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC3v3dp05LgDVNE7RucoOVWp3iokPMELIkkjXKWlbtWDQ&oe=670504B5)

changelog.change_log: Fixed a small bug, where the description text would not reload by Danish language. (written text is still in English, voice over is only in Danish)

Map reappears on the right place, if the user rotates.
Small bug fixes.
This version includes now the German voice over languages and there is a fix for map not loading all the downloaded locations.
